website_summaries.verdict: With its towering treehouse, huge assortment of cute furnishings, and trio of fuzzy friends, this is easily the most comprehensive Calico Critters set available.
pros: treetop cabin, swings, books, picnic table, baby side, toys, bookshelf, etc
cons: A particularly pricy Calico Critters playset

customer_reviews.title: Flawed but adorable
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old was dreaming of a treehouse for her critters, so she got this as a gift. It's adorable, just like all the other critter accessories. However, parts of it are a source of frustration. The swing really isn't deep enough for a critter to swing in it, and the strings that are supposed to hold the swing up don't stay put. Likewise, the big slide doesn't stay put either. My daughter likes the treehouse but it really needs improvements. For the price, I expected better design.
customer_reviews.author: Not the average housewife

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter's favorite present for her 6th birthday
customer_reviews.text: While this item is quite expensive, it is well made and the Granddaughter plays with it nonstop. We bought this and several sets of the animals and other smaller play sets for her birthday. The little animals are very cute, and their outfits are well done (who sews these tiny little outfits?). The slide works well for the animals. My son-in law ended up gluing the swing ropes to the swing, as they keep coming off. tree top swivels and comes off occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Best Calico Critters Playset
customer_reviews.text: This is ADORABLE and good for lots and lots of make believe time. there are TONS of tiny pieces, so definitely not for youngest kids, or you could just withhold the tiniest ones until your kid is 4-5. My daughter has several Calico Critters playsets. This is her favorite. The only minor issue was that the swing comes off it's ropes too often. Fixed that with some scotch tape!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Prather

customer_reviews.title: and they love this playset
customer_reviews.text: We have no toys left in the house, as our 'children are in their 40's. Their children, both girls however, are 6 and 8. They are staying for over a month, and they love this playset. They still collect shopkins, so these are very similar, BUT with a house and all sorts of stuff. Money well spent, in our grandparentish estimation.
customer_reviews.author: bnorth

customer_reviews.title: Really cute tree house
customer_reviews.text: My toddler really enjoys playing with this. I did have to take away the small accessory items as they are a choking hazard and will save those pieces for when she is older. I wish some of the attachments did not come apart so easily. For example, the slide is always knocking loose. The string for the swing is also flimsy and comes loose. And it’s difficult to get the animal figures to sit on the swing. The swing is a little too small and the string goes on awkwardly.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for older toddler and up!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great gift for my 2.5 year old daughter who loves to sit and pretend with the little animals. I love that it has a small house but it is a tree house making it a bit more imaginative. My older daughter (7) enjoys playing with it too. Definitely has some teeny tiny parts included- tiny food and toys for the little animals so would not recommend this for any child who is still putting things in their mouth. Great toy for an older toddler and up
customer_reviews.author: Bruce&Lara

customer_reviews.title: Would have LOVED to get this when I was little. Great quality and level of detail.
customer_reviews.text: My three year old god daughter absolutely loves this tree house. She plays with it everyday. Super easy to assembly and disassemble. The level of detail that went into it is impressive. Be ware though, all their sets come with many small parts; i.e. plates, cups, utensils. Very cool but can be overwhelming for a little one (could be a choke hazard foe very little ones). We put some of the pieces away for her when she is older. Great buy. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn Bricen

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining for the boys.
customer_reviews.text: Loads of fun playtime for my boys. They love this! Fun to watch their imagination. Our dog ate two of the little critters so we are now doing exposure for Critter PTSD, but otherwise a massive hit! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Runohmollyrun

customer_reviews.title: Precious.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and mostly well made. The pieces are tiny tiny. We’ve had a hard time keeping the swing and bucket in place. My 4 year old has a hard time holding pieces because they are so small.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ... for two of my grand daughters and they both loved it. My grand son loves to play with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two of my grand daughters and they both loved it. My grand son loves to play with it with his older sister, great purchase and worth the price. I know that the reviews say the pieces fall off the tree and such. My grand children have not complained. There are a lot of small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Tree house!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good gift idea, if I do say so myself. I gave it to my three year old and it keeps her entertained for hours! I’m so impressed with the detail in the little accessories. The only thing that’s a kind of annoying is that the tree swing always falls off the string that’s supposed to hold it up, and I’m constantly having to restring it. Otherwise it’s adorable and I can tell it’s a toy that will be a fave for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: For ages 5 and up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his 3rd birthday. The product is adorable and very well made. However I think my grandson is still too young to appreciate some of it. The parts are very small and intricate, much better for a five to seven year old. Literally some of the accessories are as small as your fingernail. It said on the box age appropriate for 3 year olds but I disagree.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Callico Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I started picking up these for my niece since Christmas. They are so cute and fun! So many little things, but scary how little they are, like dishes, small props for the Critters, etc. the pieces can be easily lost or accidentally vacuumed up. Great collectible play kits!
customer_reviews.author: NinjaNutjob

customer_reviews.title: Two chipmunks missing
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, two of the three chipmunks were missing. It looked like someone had taken them out and re-taped the box. Two chipmunks should be sent to replace the missing characters.
customer_reviews.author: Monique M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. My granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My granddaughter loves it. The only thing I see wrong is the house will not stay in place. It needs glued on and the slide needs a better way of attaching as it continually falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Box was smashed on one end like it was dropped
customer_reviews.text: The outer box was damaged and the inner box was smashed on one end, it is a gift to my grand daughter So I hope it is not damaged when she opens it
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: We have calico critters and a competitor brand and the quality difference is definitely noticable. The critters are softer (and cuter) and the plastic pieces have better colors and have a nicer feel. The only annoying part about the tree house is the top doesn't click in and it tends to fall off. Super cute and my little one loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: SMALL FOR THE ACCESSORIES
customer_reviews.text: YOU CAN'T FIT THAT MANY THINGS INTO THIS TREEHOUSE. i WAS GLAD I BOUGHT OTHER BUILDINGS SO I COULD PUT THEM TOGETHER BUT IF I GOT THIS ON IT'S OWN YOU GET BORED QUICK WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Stockman

customer_reviews.title: Definately ordering more
customer_reviews.text: My daughters ages 8 and 3 both love these Calico Critters. They are a little expensive. But the furniture set are full of all sorts of accessories, for real imagintive play
customer_reviews.author: heather whitener

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is very happy. Easy to set up. Took about 30-45 min. Lots of stuff. Absolutely happy.
customer_reviews.author: KPetty

customer_reviews.title: Great toy - our kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, was exactly as expected. So many teeny tiny little bitty baby pieces!! So get ready for that. Lol. Otherwise, the girls absolutely love it and have been playing with it a ton. Great Christmas gift. It was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and super great prize!! Daughter loves it! Lots of small pieces though!
customer_reviews.author: MamaFratelli

customer_reviews.title: Calico Critters must
customer_reviews.text: Just as cool as it looks! The kids love it. Can't believe we got so much for such a good price. Perfect birthday present for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this piece! Super cute addition to her collection.
customer_reviews.author: khensle

customer_reviews.title: My daughter received this for her 3rd birthday. The ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for her 3rd birthday. The pieces are even tinier than I expected, but she loves it! We just have to be really careful keeping track of all the tiny pieces. Also, priced quite high for simple plastic.
customer_reviews.author: sand yo

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a hit when gift was opened. Little girl loved it.
customer_reviews.author: RHJDel

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute treehouse with critters for my 3 year old boy for his birthday. He's really into playing pretend and using imagination and making families out of everything. Also loves animals and cute things. I liked the treehouse idea as it seems better suited for a rough boy. Only problem is there's many pieces to lose on the floor. 3 year olds don't keep track of all the things.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Segerson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Great quality!! My daughter has had it for two months now and it’s still very durable! I had to glue the seat of the swing on to the string but it was a quick fix and was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome treehouse
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this little critters treehouse. The details in this toy add adventure and creativity to play. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: ETLongIsland

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: just got this for my daughters birthday and its super nice and got it for a great price i would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swing has some issues
customer_reviews.text: The swing will NOT stay on! Frustrates my girls and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Silverlinning

customer_reviews.title: Great for CC kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 y/o daughter has a CC town and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is horribly designed. The attachment pieces do not stay connected, and the strings (literally cotton strings) for the swing and pully basket are a joke. I had to glue all the pieces to the base just so they didn’t come off every time my daughter plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Blane

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for a Calico Critters fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a Calico Critters fan. She loves it. That's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my granddaughter. She loved it. So cute. She was ssssoooo excited. The package arrived sooner than expected and was in great shape. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: J Poteet

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but had to super glue parts in place or falls apart relatively easily.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Couture

customer_reviews.title: Thank god fir neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Delivered to wrong address my neighbor was nice enough to bring it me. This was a birthday gift, if my neighbor wouldn’t have brought it down, it would have ruined my grand daughters special day
customer_reviews.author: Darla M. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gift set
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Our friend’s daughter is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun, encourages use of your imagination.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my grandchild, just turning 7. She loves it. I did not put it together but I did watch videos before purchasing to make sure it wasn't an all day, 12 different tools needed, plus tape! adventure. According to my daughter, it wasn't :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Very cool but it should come with everything pictured on box ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool but it should come with everything pictured on box and it does not. Only comes with a couple critters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces are so tiny even for my 5 year old. I just took those away and gave her the bigger pieces to play with. Other than that she loves the tree house. it is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but I really don't like how the little house on top moves easily out of its place
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Allows imaginations to sore!
customer_reviews.text: Our five-year-old granddaughter loves this. Several families got together and all black different pieces to make her a calico Critter Village it’s adorable she’s using her imagination and the stories are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Win for Grandma
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old granddaughter loved this and put it together herself.
customer_reviews.author: John Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We got it for my daughter's 5th birthday and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Box was delivered damaged and had clearly been opened and returned by another customer
customer_reviews.text: Too late to return since I need for a gift but this is now the third time amazon has delivered me previously opened toys in damaged boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Coppens

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: The box for the gift set was damaged and with big holes. It does not look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce P

customer_reviews.title: Box made it look amazing, but there wasn't much to it.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Pretty expensive for what you get. It's actually pretty small, not much to it. Although the box made it look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: but lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Many small parts to keep track of, but lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be my daughter's birthday gift. Very disappointed to see there is a big hole on the product box! The bag inside is damaged and one part is out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 9 year old girl!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for our 9 year old granddaughter. She lived it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Orr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Just like I saw at Toys R Us My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: TamTH

customer_reviews.title: Calico Treehouse
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and it connected to the other stuff we had.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute and cute. Hardily made for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute and cute. Hardily made for the 4 little girls to which the set was given. Only issue---the size of the pieces---itty bitty--even for the smallest hands.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gubbins

customer_reviews.title: Less is more.
customer_reviews.text: SO UPSETTING. This set is so so so cute. Looking at the picture, I'm reminded all over again why I bought it. But ALL the pieces come apart. They should make it so that once you put it together it stays together. A few loose pieces would be understandable, but with so many to the point it falls apart while the child is playing...it's a waste. We don't even use it with the older kids because of this :( And those "filler" pieces are nothing but choking hazards. Less is sometimes more.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my daughter, but unfortunately it kept falling apart. Wish the pieces would stick on better. As a result, it's not played with by her.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy101

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received product in two days. My grand daughter loves them and I did not miss her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rinell

customer_reviews.title: 5 for cuteness - 4 for function
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and my 1 year old plays with it every day. Only downside I see is that the little house on top detaches and when you tried to Clampett down it does not stay so it’s a little frustrating for a one-year-old and to be honest for an adult who is playing with them because it keeps coming off I suppose you could hot glue it but gave it the rating for cuteness level
customer_reviews.author: Jen PA-C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my granddaughter who loves these little animals !
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves everything Critters. She was so excited to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This toy is the best. My 4 yr old gran daughter played with it for 4 straight hours. O
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice treehouse
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was thrilled with it. It is made well and had a lot of pieces of furniture to set upnthe rooms
customer_reviews.author: Granny521

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: calico critters are high quality-my grand daughter loved this toy
customer_reviews.author: nan orth

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Present for Granddaughter's 4th Birthday
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Calico Critters Treehouse Gift Set for our Granddaugter's 4th birthday. She TOTALLY loves it. It has a large number of critter pieces as well as some of the critters. It looks like she will have a lot of fun playing with the critters and all of the small play pieces that came in the set. We originally looked at just the treehouse but immediately decided that it was worthless without the critters and all of their pieces. The idea is the imaginative play that comes from the critters with all of their pieces in the treehouse.
customer_reviews.author: MN_EE

customer_reviews.title: Thank you thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter and she loves it. Thank you. She had been wanting it since Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Foster

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. The tree house fell apart when my grandson ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The tree house fell apart when my grandson played. The house fell off , the one ladder didn't snap on. And very expensive for that quality. Still waiting for my refund. The swing wouldn't stay put. Very disappointed, because we have a old one that still is in great shape , a house with 4 bunnies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst you purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: It was terrible. In fact, it just landed in the trash can after only 2 months. It was made from cheap plastic, and terribly crafted. Not even close to the quality we'd expected. Every time my son ( who is very gentle) touched it, a piece fell off. Don't ever buy any Calico Critter products; they are a total waste if money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Griffith

product_meta.title: Calico Critters Adventure Treehouse Gift Set
product_meta.description: Critters have tons of fun playing in the Adventure Tree House! Includes over 65 furniture pieces, accessories and 3 Critters! Calico Critters is a unique and adorable range of distinctive animal characters with charming and beautifully detailed homes, furniture and accessories. They live, work and play in an idyllic and wonderful place called Calico Village. These timeless, classic toys promote wholesome family values. These life-like, award-winning miniatures also inspire imagination and creativity. These adorable toys promote healthy cognitive development through pretend play. Acting out storylines will exercise narrative and critical thinking processes, while fine motor skills and dexterity improve as little ones manipulate the fun environments, critters and accessories.
feature_bullets: Play and picnic at the Adventure Treehouse!
Gift Set includes over 65 pieces including the Treehouse with cabin, three poseable Calico Critter figures, ladders, swing, slide and more furniture and accessories
Hazelnut chipmunk siblings Sarah and Luke and Silk Cat sister Faith go fishing, have picnics, play on the baby slide and have tea parties!
Connects to the Lakeside Lodge for more fun and adventure
Encourages imaginative and pretend play and suitable for children ages 3 and above

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
